holidays.title: Bluebird of Happiness Day
holidays.description: Bluebirds are also known as the harbingers of happiness.

holidays.title: Gold Star Mother’s and Family Day
holidays.description: Honoring families of those who have received The Gold Star – the military award no one wants.

holidays.title: Heritage Day
holidays.description: A day that celebrates South Africa’s roots, their rich, vibrant, and diverse cultures.

holidays.title: Innergize Day
holidays.description: Forget your troubles, and ease into the tranquil spirit of the autumn season.

holidays.title: Lash Stylists’ Day
holidays.description: Call your eyelash stylist and get ready because it’s Lash Stylists’ Day!

holidays.title: National Horchata Day
holidays.description: This day has been set aside to indulge in the creamy deliciousness that is horchata.

holidays.title: National Mofongo Day
holidays.description: Get your taste buds ready to dive deep into all the flavors of this beloved cuisine.

holidays.title: National Punctuation Day
holidays.description: “Let’s eat, Grandma!” or “Let’s eat Grandma!” — it’s clear that punctuation saves lives.

holidays.title: Our Lady of Mercedes Day
holidays.description: Dominicans celebrate Our Lady of Mercedes Day with processions and church ceremonies.

holidays.title: Schwenkfelder Thanksgiving
holidays.description: This is the longest-continually celebrated Thanksgiving in America.

holidays.title: World Bollywood Day
holidays.description: Release your inner Shah Rukh Khan or Priyanka Chopra!

holidays.title: World Day of The Deaf
holidays.description: Let's celebrate the achievements of deaf people, as we help create a safer environment for them.

holidays.title: World Rivers Day
holidays.description: Observe World Rivers Day by educating yourself and getting involved in clean-up drives.

holidays.title: Ben Platt’s Birthday
holidays.description: This young and dynamic musical actor has already touched the heights of his career

holidays.title: Daisy Márquez’s Birthday

holidays.title: DJ Ghost’s Birthday
holidays.description: This YouTuber has become well-known in the hip-hop scene for his commentary.

holidays.title: F. Scott Fitzgerald’s Birthday
holidays.description: This critically acclaimed novelist and screenwriter had a unique way with words!

holidays.title: Hannah Brown’s Birthday
